title: Keep Getting Friend Requests from random Low Level Accounts
body: I keep getting random friend requests from seemingly random names (Number/Letter Combinations) that are super low level accounts (Generally level 3), I dont know why this is happening. Is there bots doing this?

replies.body:
Very likely they are bots. I believe some boosting 'services' use botted accounts to advertise their boosting 'services' while they level them as a "kill two birds with one stone" type deal.

For the record, both of these behaviours are against the rules and face serious consequences, so I would encourage you to report them (via [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you cannot report in post-game).
The thing is its from accounts that I have never even seen before nor played a game with (they are generally lvl 2)
It's usually automatic. You have a name that's a regular word so you're more likely to be caught in that net.
